docs.lead_paragraph: A former Marine charged Tuesday with murder after the body of his alleged lover was found in an abandoned California mine shaft had been looking into how to dispose of a human body, a sheriff's investigator said.

headline.main: Sheriff: Ex-Marine Inquired About Body Disposal
headline.print_headline: Sheriff: Ex-Marine Inquired About Body Disposal

docs.snippet: A former Marine charged Tuesday with murder after the body of his alleged lover was found in an abandoned California mine shaft had been looking into how to dispose of a human body, a sheriff's investigator said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Indonesian police said on Tuesday they have tested a U.S. teen, detained after the discovery of her mother's battered body in a suitcase in Bali, to see if she is pregnant and are awaiting the result.

headline.main: U.S. Teen Held After Mother's Body Found in Bali Tested for Pregnancy
headline.print_headline: U.S. Teen Held After Mother's Body Found in Bali Tested for Pregnancy

docs.snippet: Indonesian police said on Tuesday they have tested a U.S. teen, detained after the discovery of her mother's battered body in a suitcase in Bali, to see if she is pregnant and are awaiting the result.

docs.lead_paragraph: For nearly two months, Southern California sheriff's deputies and a legion of volunteers scoured the vast, rough terrain peppered with abandoned mine pits and deep bodies of water where the 19-year-old pregnant wife of a U.S. Marine disappeared.

headline.main: Body of Marine's Missing Wife Found in Mine Shaft
headline.print_headline: Body of Marine's Missing Wife Found in Mine Shaft

docs.snippet: For nearly two months, Southern California sheriff's deputies and a legion of volunteers scoured the vast, rough terrain peppered with abandoned mine pits and deep bodies of water where the 19-year-old pregnant wife of a U.S. Marine disappeared.

docs.lead_paragraph: An average middle-income family in the United States can expect to spend about $245,000 over 18 years to raise a child born in 2013, the U.S. government estimated on Monday.

headline.main: Cost of Raising a Child in U.S. Tops $245,000, USDA Says
headline.print_headline: Cost of Raising a Child in U.S. Tops $245,000, USDA Says

docs.snippet: An average middle-income family in the United States can expect to spend about $245,000 over 18 years to raise a child born in 2013, the U.S. government estimated on Monday.

headline.main: XRay: A New Tool for Tracking the Use of Personal Data on the Web

docs.abstract: A team of computer scientists at Columbia has developed a research tool for tracking the use of personal data online.
docs.snippet: A team of computer scientists at Columbia has developed a research tool for tracking the use of personal data online.

docs.lead_paragraph: A message for new parents: get ready for sticker shock.

headline.main: USDA: Cost to Raise Child Up Slightly to $245,340
headline.print_headline: USDA: Cost to Raise Child Up Slightly to $245,340

headline.main: Lots of Reasons to Eat Fish

docs.abstract: Fish is good for you, better than heart-damaging red meat and even better than lean poultry. Even so, it is not a popular choice in the kitchen — but there are ways to overcome opposition to it.
docs.snippet: Fish is good for you, better than heart-damaging red meat and even better than lean poultry. Even so, it is not a popular choice in the kitchen — but there are ways to overcome opposition to it.

docs.lead_paragraph: The woman, who is not an Irish citizen, sought an abortion under a clause in the new Protection of Life During Pregnancy Act, saying that she was suicidal.

headline.main: Case in Which Abortion Was Denied Reignites Controversy Over Irish Law
headline.print_headline: Case in Which Abortion Was Denied Reignites Controversy Over Irish Law

docs.abstract: Woman living in Ireland who was refused abortion despite asserting that she was suicidal delivers her baby by cesarean; Irish Parliament legalized termination of pregnancy in July 2013 in cases when there is real and substantial risk to life of mother, including threat of suicide over pregnancy; psychiatrists determined that woman had suicidal thoughts, but obstetrician declared that fetus was viable and that it should be delivered; baby is reported to be healthy and is expected to be taken into state care.
docs.snippet: The woman, who is not an Irish citizen, sought an abortion under a clause in the new Protection of Life During Pregnancy Act, saying that she was suicidal.

docs.abstract: They’re more likely than ever before to live with a partner, according to a new report. Will the data change how America talks about unmarried parenting?
docs.snippet: They’re more likely than ever before to live with a partner, according to a new report. Will the data change how America talks about unmarried parenting?

headline.main: After a Miscarriage, Seeking Permission to Grieve

docs.abstract: I bought the milk in the refrigerator while I was still pregnant. When I sent that text, the baby was already dead, and I didn’t know it yet.
docs.snippet: I bought the milk in the refrigerator while I was still pregnant. When I sent that text, the baby was already dead, and I didn’t know it yet.
